name: Execute (UncreativeOutput)
description:
Interrupted 7DFPS entry for 2021.

Step into the role of an executioner and suffer through their own personal dungeon of the soul.
Use the mouse probably. Press Enter for the pause menu.

I had to step away from this game with 2 days to go, so it's mostly unfinished and placeholder art. The key gimmick is there though.
